app.name: TousAntiCovid
onboarding.welcomeController.title: Welcome
onboarding.welcomeController.mainMessage: Let‚Äôs protect our loved ones, ourselves and everybody else
Use TousAntiCovid to help fight the pandemic by reducing transmission risks.
onboarding.explanationsController.title: It‚Äôs simple!
onboarding.explanationsController.stepFo: TousAntiCovid uses your phone‚Äôs Bluetooth connection to detect other users‚Äô phones that are close to yours.
onboarding.explanationsController.stepIn: You will be alerted if you have been in close contact with a user who has tested positive for COVID-19.
onboarding.explanationsController.stepBe: Protect my loved ones and everybody else

If you have been diagnosed as a COVID-19 case, the test results will come with a code to be scanned or entered manually with your positive test results or you will receive this code from your doctor. This will allow you to send anonymous alerts to the users you have met.
onboarding.privacyController.title: Confidentiality
onboarding.proximityController.title: Detection
onboarding.proximityController.mainMessa:
TousAntiCovid needs to use your phone‚Äôs Bluetooth connection in order to work.
No location data are shared or recorded.
onboarding.beAwareController.title: Notifications
onboarding.beAwareController.mainMessage: Receive push notification if you are at risk

If you have been in close contact with a user who is reported as a COVID-19 case (exposure at less than one metre lasting 15 minutes or more), you will be alerted.

TousAntiCovid will then give you the recommendations from the Ministry for Solidarity and Health.
onboarding.gesturesController.title: Don‚Äôt forget!
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture2: Cough or sneeze into you elbow or into a tissue
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture3: Use single-use tissues and throw them in the bin
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture4: Avoid shaking hands, hugs and kisses
onboarding.batteryController.title: Battery use
onboarding.batteryController.mainMessage: TousAntiCovid needs to run as a background app.
To enable TousAntiCovid to run as a background app, deactivate battery optimisation for TousAntiCovid only.
proximityController.tabBar.title: Protect
privacyController.tabBar.title: Confidentiality
sharingController.tabBar.title: Share
sickController.message.testedPositive.ti: Have you been diagnosed as a COVID-19 case?
sickController.message.testedPositive.su:
You have received a code with your test results or been given a code by your doctor: please scan or enter the code so that the users you have met can be alerted.
Take good care of yourself!
sickController.message.youHaveSymptoms.s:
Do you want to know what to do?
This questionnaire can guide you.
sickController.message.cured.title: If you are not ill
sickController.message.cured.subtitle: Your COVID-19 test is negative. Report it with the button below:
sickController.state.nothing.title: You have not been exposed to any user who has been diagnosed as positive or diagnosed as a COVID-19 case
sickController.state.nothing.subtitle: You still have to remember the barrier gestures and public health recommendations
sickController.state.contact.title: In the last few days you have been exposed to one or more users diagnosed as a  COVID-19 case
sickController.state.contact.subtitle: Tell your doctor that you have been alerted as a risky contact and self-isolate.
Are you sure you want to delete the notification?
sharingController.title: Share
sharingController.mainMessage.title: The more of us use TousAntiCovid, the better we are protected
sharingController.mainMessage.subtitle: We need you. The impact that this app has on fighting COVID-19 depends on you! Please share it with your friends and family.
sharingController.appSharingMessage: I‚Äôm using TousAntiCovid to fight the pandemic, to send and receive information. You should install the app too: https://bonjour.stopcovid.gouv.fr/
aboutController.title: About
aboutController.mainMessage.title: About TousAntiCovid
aboutController.mainMessage.subtitle:
This app was developed by the TousAntiCovid team under the supervision of the Ministry for Solidarity and Health and the Ministry of State for Digital Affairs.
TousAntiCovid team: Inria, ANSSI, Capgemini, Dassault Syst√®mes, Inserm, Lunabee Studio, Ministry for Solidarity and Health, Orange, Sant√© Publique France and Withings.

informationController.title: Information
informationController.subtitle: Ministry for Solidarity and Health
informationController.mainMessage.atRisk: You have been exposed to a user diagnosed as a COVID-19 case
informationController.mainMessage.nothin: You have not been alerted about an exposure to risk
informationController.step.isolate.atRis: Please restrict your contacts to the fewest people possible. Be very diligent about strict compliance with barrier gestures.
informationController.step.isolate.nothi: Please comply with the barrier gestures to slow the propagation of the virus
informationController.step.beCareful.atR: If you have any doubts, complete the questionnaire or call your doctor.
informationController.step.beCareful.not: If you have any doubts, see your doctor if you think you have symptoms. And complete the questionnaire
informationController.step.appointment.s: Call your doctor if necessary. If you do not have a doctor, call the number below to find a doctor (free service, toll free call)
informationController.step.moreInfo.subt: To get personalized recommendations for your health and that of your loved ones.
enterCodeController.title: Your code
enterCodeController.mainMessage.title: Please enter the code you have received with your test results.
enterCodeController.mainMessage.subtitle: This code is random and does not contain any personal information. It is valid for 60 minutes.
enterCodeController.noCodeEnteredAlert.m: You need to enter the code before continuing
scanCodeController.explanation: Point your phone at the QR code printed on your test results (this code is anonymous and does not contain any personal information)
common.error.callImpossible: You cannot call from this phone
common.needCameraAccessToScan: The app needs to access the camera to scan the QR Code
common.needLocalisationAccessToScan: Android needs to access the location of this device. TousAntiCovid will only use Bluetooth detection of nearby phones and never location data. Tap on settings to allow

common.error.needRegister: You need to be registered to do this

notification.atRisk.title: Risk of exposure to COVID-19
notification.atRisk.message: In the last few days, you have been exposed to a user who has been diagnosed as a COVID-19 case. If you are a minor, talk to your parents or your guardians. Tap here to find out what to do.
manageDataController.title: My data
manageDataController.eraseLocalHistory.s: This will delete all of the information about "Bluetooth contacts " collected and stored on your phone.
manageDataController.eraseLocalHistory.c: Are you sure that you want to delete the entire history of "Bluetooth contacts" collected up until now? This action cannot be undone.
This will delete all of your own pseudonyms that have been shared with other phones and uploaded to the server.
This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete your temporary pseudonyms from the server?
manageDataController.eraseRemoteAlert.su: Whenever you have close contacts with users who have been diagnosed as COVID-19 cases you receive alerts. Attention, this will delete all of the alerts.
manageDataController.eraseRemoteAlert.co: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete your alerts?
manageDataController.quitStopCovid.title: Quit TousAntiCovid
manageDataController.quitStopCovid.subti: You can stop using TousAntiCovid and delete all of your personal information at any time.
manageDataController.quitStopCovid.succe: All of your information has been deleted
manageDataController.quitStopCovid.confi: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to quit TousAntiCovid?
symptomsOriginController.title: Symptoms
symptomsOriginController.explanation.tit: Please specify when your symptoms first appeared
symptomsOriginController.explanation.sub: This will help evaluate how long you are contagious
sendHistoryController.title: Send history
sendHistoryController.mainMessage.title: Save lives by joining the citizens‚Äô fight against COVID-19
sendHistoryController.mainMessage.subtit:
Anonymously sharing your "Bluetooth contacts" helps break the transmission chains and save lives.

By sending this information, I authorise TousAntiCovid to store it on the server for 14 days.
sendHistoryController.dontSend.alert.mes: Your choice is final. Are you sure that you don‚Äôt want to send your " Bluetooth contacts"?

callCenterController.header.title: In an emergency
callCenterController.header.subtitle: Dial 15

onboarding.gesturesController.gesture6: Keep a distance of at least one metre from others

notification.channel.error.title: Error

notification.error.message: An error has occurred during the use of TousAntiCovid. You need to restart the app.
sickController.sick.title: Thank you
sickController.sick.mainMessage.title: Take good care of yourself!
sickController.sick.mainMessage.subtitle:
Here are the health recommendations.

Call your doctor if you have any doubts about the progress of the disease. If you do not have a doctor, call the number below to find a doctor (free service, toll free call).

 If you are having trouble breathing, call 15 immediately (or 114 for the hearing impaired).
enterCodeController.alert.invalidCode.me: The code entered is not valid. Please try again.
The code entered is not valid. Please try again.
onboarding.noBleController.title: Incompatible phone
onboarding.noBleController.mainMessage.t: TousAntiCovid cannot run on your phone, which does not support Bluetooth Low Energy
onboarding.noBleController.mainMessage.s:
But you can still help fight COVID-19 by sharing this app. The more people use it, the more effective it is.
Talk to your friends and family!

myHealthController.notRegistered.mainMes: You have to activate TousAntiCovid first
To be informed of a contamination risk, you have to activate TousAntiCovid in the "Protect" tab.
myHealthController.covidAdvices.title: My COVID recommendations
myHealthController.covidAdvices.subtitle: Find personalized advice on prevention and care on the "Mes Conseils Covid" website. "Mes Conseils Covid" is provided by the Ministry for Solidarity and Health.

myHealthController.notification.title: Risk notification
myHealthController.notification.subtitle:
You will be alerted if you have been in close contact with a user who is reported as a COVID-19 case (exposure at less than one metre lasting 15 minutes or more). Your status is checked every 24h.

TousAntiCovid will then give you the recommendations from the Ministry for Solidarity and Health.

keyfigure.reffectif.label: R effectif
keyfigure.reffectif.description: Le nombre de reproduction du virus : c‚Äôest le nombre moyen de personnes qu‚Äôun malade peut contaminer. Actualis√© r√©guli√®rement, cet indicateur mesure l‚Äôintensit√© de la circulation du virus. Si le R effectif est sup√©rieur √† 1, l‚Äô√©pid√©mie se d√©veloppe ; s‚Äôil est inf√©rieur √† 1, l‚Äô√©pid√©mie r√©gresse. Le R0 correspond au R effectif en l‚Äôabsence totale de mesures de contr√¥le (il est estim√© en tout d√©but d‚Äô√©pid√©mie, avant leur mise en ≈ìuvre).
keyfigure.tauxincidence.label: Taux d‚Äôincidence
keyfigure.tauxincidence.description: Le taux d'incidence correspond au nombre de personnes positives pour un test √† la recherche de SARS-CoV-2 rapport√© √† la taille de la population. Il est exprim√© pour 100 000 habitants et permet de comparer des zones g√©ographiques entre elles.
keyfigure.tauxpositivite.label: Taux de positivit√©
keyfigure.tauxpositivite.description: Le taux de positivit√© correspond au nombre de personnes test√©es positives rapport√© au nombre total de personnes test√©es positives ou n√©gatives sur une p√©riode donn√©e.
keyfigure.tauxoccupation.label: Taux d‚Äôoccupation

Cet indicateur mesure la tension sur les capacit√©s hospitali√®res en r√©animation.
